title: 地皮怎么弄无怪
txt_content: 地皮世界怎么弄无怪，我是MV的多世界插件

replies.author: CubeTian
replies.txt_content:
/mv gamerule doMobSpawning false 
这样就可以了

replies.author: 迷途的村庄
replies.txt_content:
找到配置文件world.yml用notepad++打开
找到difficulty: EASY —— 难度
把“EASY”改成“Peaceful”

replies.author: JiuYan
replies.txt_content:
JiuYan 发表于 2015-7-18 13:31
/mv modify set difficulty 3
错了  3改0

JiuYan 发表于 2015-7-18 13:31
/mv modify set difficulty 3
{:10_492:}你这个命令只适用于MV多世界插件吧

replies.author: memexp
replies.txt_content:
要怪干嘛？
地皮就是建筑嘛！

replies.author: 幻境雲達達
replies.txt_content:
memexp 发表于 2015-7-18 13:43
要怪干嘛？
地皮就是建筑嘛！
{:10_513:}有怪物生存还咋玩

CubeTian 发表于 2015-7-18 16:48
/mv gamerule doMobSpawning false 
这样就可以了
感谢 
E
